description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，文化大革命时期的重要领导人，“四人帮”成员之一。曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理、中共中央军委常委兼中国人民解放军总政治部主任等要职。在毛泽东去世后于怀仁堂事变中被捕，后在保外就医期间因病去世。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, a key leader during the Cultural Revolution, and a member of the 'Gang of Four'. He held top positions including a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and a member of the Central Military Commission Standing Committee and Director of the PLA's General Political Department. He was arrested in the Huai Ren Tang Incident after Mao Zedong's death and later died of illness while on medical parole.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国大陆发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 指中国文化大革命后期，由江青、张春桥、姚文元、王洪文组成的政治集团。
description.en: A political faction composed of Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen during the later stages of the Chinese Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由时任中共中央第一副主席华国锋联合中共中央副主席叶剑英、中共中央办公厅主任汪东兴等人发动的政变，逮捕了“四人帮”及其在北京的党羽，结束了文化大革命。
description.en: A coup launched by then CPC First Vice Chairman Hua Guofeng, in collaboration with Vice Chairman Ye Jianying and General Office Director Wang Dongxing, which led to the arrest of the 'Gang of Four' and their associates in Beijing, effectively ending the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理等职，是粉碎四人帮事件的核心决策者之一。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He was one of the core decision-makers in the event of smashing the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家，中华人民共和国元帅，是粉碎四人帮事件的核心决策者之一。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the core decision-makers in the event of smashing the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，长期担任毛泽东的警卫，是粉碎四人帮事件的核心决策者之一。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Mao Zedong's long-term bodyguard and was one of the core decision-makers in the event of smashing the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥的妻子，毕业于燕京大学新闻系。1973年与张春桥离婚，但1998年后继续共同生活。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao's wife, a graduate of the Journalism Department of Yenching University. She divorced Zhang in 1973 but resumed living with him after 1998.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥的父亲。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao's father.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥的母亲。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao's mother.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

zh-cn: 评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉
评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》
en: Commentary on the New Historical Drama 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'

description.zh-cn: 由姚文元在毛泽东、江青授意和张春桥指导下写成的文章，发表于1965年11月10日，揭开了文化大革命的序幕。
description.en: An article written by Yao Wenyuan under the instruction of Mao Zedong and Jiang Qing, and guided by Zhang Chunqiao. Published on November 10, 1965, it is widely seen as the opening shot of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: A Chinese political figure and a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的第四任妻子，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, the fourth wife of Mao Zedong, and a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家，中华人民共和国元帅。曾被定为毛泽东的接班人，后在九一三事件中丧生。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He was once designated as Mao Zedong's successor but died in the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，张春桥、姚文元、王洪文在上海发动的夺权运动，打倒了以上海市委书记陈丕显为首的上海市委。
description.en: A power seizure movement launched in Shanghai by Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen during the Cultural Revolution, which overthrew the Shanghai Municipal Committee led by Chen Pixian.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记，在“一月风暴”中被打倒。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee and was overthrown during the 'January Storm'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，在“二月逆流”中激烈批评张春桥。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He severely criticized Zhang Chunqiao during the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，多位中共元老在怀仁堂召开的中央政治局碰头会上，对中央文革小组的所作所为提出激烈批评的事件。
description.en: An event during the Cultural Revolution where several senior CCP leaders severely criticized the actions of the Central Cultural Revolution Group at a Politburo meeting in Huairen Hall.

description.zh-cn: 中共九届二中全会，会上林彪集团与张春桥等人就“天才论”和设立国家主席问题发生激烈冲突。
description.en: The Second Plenary Session of the 9th Central Committee of the CCP, where the Lin Biao clique and Zhang Chunqiao's faction clashed fiercely over the 'genius theory' and the issue of establishing a state chairman position.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, military leader, and diplomat who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: A Chinese politician, military leader, and diplomat, who was the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China as the core of the second generation of Chinese leadership.

description.zh-cn: 1976年因悼念周恩来、反对“四人帮”而发生的群众抗议运动，期间张春桥成为被攻击的主要对象之一。
description.en: A mass protest movement in 1976 mourning Zhou Enlai and opposing the 'Gang of Four', during which Zhang Chunqiao became one of the main targets of criticism.

nodes.id: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
en: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院特别法庭对林彪、江青两个反革命集团的主犯进行的审判。
description.en: The trial of the principal defendants of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques conducted by the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 最高人民法院特别法庭

zh-cn: 最高人民法院特别法庭
en: Special Court of the Supreme People's Court

description.zh-cn: 为审判林彪、江青反革命集团案主犯而设立的特别法庭。
description.en: A special court established to try the principal defendants in the case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代著名作家、思想家。
description.en: A prominent modern Chinese writer and thinker.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅于1936年4月16日写的文章，用以维护作家田军（萧军），并讽刺以笔名“狄克”发表文章的张春桥。
description.en: An article written by Lu Xun on April 16, 1936, to defend the writer Tian Jun (Xiao Jun) and satirize Zhang Chunqiao, who published an article under the pseudonym 'Dike'.

description.zh-cn: 1947年结婚。1973年离婚，离婚报中共中央批准但未履行法律手续，1998年张春桥保外就医后两人继续共同生活。
description.en: Married in 1947. Divorced in 1973; the divorce was approved by the CPC Central Committee but legal procedures were not completed. They resumed living together after Zhang Chunqiao was released on medical parole in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 1938年8月加入中国共产党，1977年7月被开除党籍。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in August 1938 and was expelled in July 1977.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院
中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 该文的发表被普遍认为是文化大革命的序幕。
description.en: The publication of this article is widely considered to be the prelude to the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东、江青授意下，指导姚文元写出了《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: Under the instruction of Mao Zedong and Jiang Qing, he guided Yao Wenyuan in writing 'Commentary on the New Historical Drama 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office''.

description.zh-cn: 与姚文元、王洪文在上海发动了“一月风暴”夺权运动。
description.en: Along with Yao Wenyuan and Wang Hongwen, he launched the 'January Storm' power seizure movement in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: “一月风暴”打倒了以陈丕显为首的上海市委。
description.en: The 'January Storm' overthrew the Shanghai Municipal Committee led by Chen Pixian.

description.zh-cn: 在怀仁堂召开的中央政治局碰头会上，严厉批评张春桥打倒陈丕显的做法，该事件后被定性为“二月逆流”。
description.en: At a Politburo meeting in Huairen Hall, he severely criticized Zhang Chunqiao's actions in overthrowing Chen Pixian. The incident was later labeled the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 在1970年庐山会议上，张春桥因反对“天才论”和设立国家主席而受到林彪集团的激烈批评。
description.en: At the 1970 Lushan Conference, Zhang Chunqiao faced fierce criticism from the Lin Biao clique for his opposition to the 'genius theory' and the establishment of the state chairman position.

description.zh-cn: 林彪与张春桥在中共九大后矛盾激化，在1970年庐山会议上，林彪不点名地批评张春桥，并反对毛泽东提议张春桥作为其潜在接班人。
description.en: The conflict between Lin Biao and Zhang Chunqiao intensified after the 9th Party Congress. At the 1970 Lushan Conference, Lin Biao implicitly criticized Zhang and opposed Mao Zedong's suggestion of Zhang as a potential successor.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来在最后一次见毛泽东谈论四届人大的人事安排时，当面提出张春桥的“历史问题”，以阻止张春桥当总理。
description.en: During his last meeting with Mao Zedong to discuss personnel arrangements for the 4th National People's Congress, Zhou Enlai raised Zhang Chunqiao's 'historical issues' to his face to prevent him from becoming Premier.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥等人持续推动批判已被剥夺权力的邓小平，并在四五运动后指责邓小平是“纳吉”。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao and others continuously pushed for the criticism of Deng Xiaoping, who had already been stripped of power, and accused Deng of being a 'Nagy' after the 1976 Tiananmen Incident.

description.zh-cn: 四五运动期间，抗议者在南京和北京等地贴出标语，要求“把赫鲁晓夫式的野心家、阴谋家、两面派的张春桥揪出来示众！”
description.en: During the 1976 Tiananmen Incident, protesters in Nanjing, Beijing, and other places put up posters demanding to 'drag out the Khrushchev-style ambitious, conspiratorial, two-faced Zhang Chunqiao for public criticism!'

description.zh-cn: 联合叶剑英、汪东兴等人，在中南海怀仁堂以开会的名义诱捕了张春桥。
description.en: In collaboration with Ye Jianying, Wang Dongxing, and others, he lured and arrested Zhang Chunqiao at Huairen Hall in Zhongnanhai under the pretext of a meeting.

description.zh-cn: 联合华国锋、汪东兴等人，在中南海怀仁堂以开会的名义诱捕了张春桥。
description.en: In collaboration with Hua Guofeng, Wang Dongxing, and others, he lured and arrested Zhang Chunqiao at Huairen Hall in Zhongnanhai under the pretext of a meeting.

description.zh-cn: 联合华国锋、叶剑英等人，在中南海怀仁堂以开会的名义诱捕了张春桥。
description.en: In collaboration with Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, and others, he lured and arrested Zhang Chunqiao at Huairen Hall in Zhongnanhai under the pretext of a meeting.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥作为“四人帮”成员之一在怀仁堂事变中被逮捕。
description.en: As a member of the 'Gang of Four', Zhang Chunqiao was arrested during the Huai Ren Tang Incident.

relationships.source: 最高人民法院特别法庭

description.zh-cn: 作为“林彪、江青反革命集团案”的主犯，判处张春桥死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: As a principal defendant in the 'Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques', sentenced Zhang Chunqiao to death with a two-year reprieve.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅撰写《三月的租界》一文，讽刺以笔名“狄克”发表文章批评作家萧军的张春桥。
description.en: Lu Xun wrote the article 'San Yue De Zu Jie' (Concessions in March) to satirize Zhang Chunqiao, who had published an article under the pseudonym 'Dike' criticizing the writer Xiao Jun.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥于1998年1月送保外就医，被安置在江苏江阴，并于2005年4月21日在该地病逝。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao was sent for medical parole in January 1998 and was placed in Jiangyin, Jiangsu, where he died of illness on April 21, 2005.
